Row.Text: Use Real Resource Placement
Real Name Earth
Simulate the rise and fall of historical civilizations spread out the earth. Or conquer and dominate to the farthest place that one can see!
RealNameEarth v7
Need [COLOR_RED]DLC_01(Mongol)[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]Need to enable same name Mod
Need [COLOR_RED]All[ENDCOLOR] DLC.[NEWLINE]Need to enable same name Mod
Select Map Version
Select Game Mode
Game Mode: {1_GameMode}
Free For All
The first 22 Civilizations will come on stage.[NEWLINE]But you can choose all DLC Civilizations.
Ancient Civilizations
The Civilizations originated in the Ancient Age will come on stage.[NEWLINE]You will be random assigned a civilization random by system if you choose a civilization out of the Ancient Age.
Modern Civilizations
The Civilizations originated in the Modern Age will come on stage.[NEWLINE]You will be random assigned a civilization by system if you choose a civilization out of the Modern Age.
Fictional Universe
There will appear 12 Random Civilizations.
Load Historical System
Map Size: {1_mapSize}[NEWLINE]{2_mapSizeDesc}
Map Size: {1_mapSize}
1 additional attack per turn. May heal damage [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Outside of Friendly Territory[ENDCOLOR]. 2 HP healed per turn
First Settler
2 Extra Movement and Ignores Terrain Cost
Song of Regenbogen
+100% Defense[NEWLINE]Can Move After Attacking
+15% Defense
May Attack Twice[NEWLINE]-25% strength when using Ranged Attacks
All military naval units receive +100% defense and can move after attacking.
Monument of High Seas Fleet

The High Seas Fleet (German: Hochseeflotte) was the main battle fleet of the Imperial German Navy during World War I. The fleet was based at Wilhelmshaven in the Jade estuary, and commanded by Admirals Friedrich von Ingenohl (1913–1915), Hugo von Pohl (1915–1916), Reinhard Scheer (1916–1918), and Franz von Hipper (1918). It posed such a threat to the Royal Navy's control of the seas around Britain that the British Grand Fleet had to remain concentrated in the North Sea for the duration of the war, even as many urgent tasks in other theatres of war went undone for lack of ships.

The Monument of High Seas Fleet Wonder increases the defense of all military naval units by 100%. It also provides +1 culture. The Monument of High Seas Fleet only can be constructed when German control Scapa Flow by city.
The legacy of High Seas Fleet is immortal.

In the waryear, a group of aspirants took the opportunity and organized their own army because they wanted to share power.But do not believe them. In fact, they just want to capture your authority when you are at the last gasp after you beat your enemy.
You beat the hypocritical schemers, and in the baptism of war, you got your own army which convinced by the world.
National Palace Museum
Defensive Buildings in all Cities are 25% more effective.

The National Palace Museum was originally established as the Palace Museum in Peking's Forbidden City on 10 October 1925, shortly after the expulsion of Puyi, the last emperor of Qing Dynasty, from the Forbidden City by warlord Feng Yuhsiang. The articles in the museum consisted of the valuables of the former Imperial family.
Honno-Ji
Increases the defense of all melee units by 15% and +5 Happiness.

The Incident at Honno-ji (Honno-ji no Hen) refers to the forced suicide on June 21, 1582 of Japanese daimyo Oda Nobunaga at the hands of his samurai general Akechi Mitsuhide. This occurred in Honno-ji, a temple in Kyoto, ending Nobunaga's quest to consolidate centralized power in Japan under his authority.
The Honno-Ji Wonder increases the defense of all melee units by 15%. It also provides +5 Happiness. The Honno-Ji only can be constructed when Japan win the Incident at Honno-Ji.
Akechi Mitsuhide
One of our general revolt, the rebels surrounded the Kyoto layers.
The local potential enemy has been eliminated, the past battlefield has became a scenic spot.
Seydlitz
The news which shocked the world was that a seriously injured warship returned to the homeport miraculously, our naval soldiers and officers were excited about it.
There arose a heroine from our army in the battle of recapturing the lost territory.
A brave and hardy soldier has run over twenty-six miles on foot to warn of the invasion![NEWLINE]This heroic deed has inspired our entire army!
Unit will be consumed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+8 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Industrial Park
The Industrial Park can only be built on flatlands. Requires Replaceable Parts.

Although a relative latecomer to manufacturing, by the early twentieth century the German factories were among the most efficient. During the First and Second World Wars German plants built thousands of tanks, planes, and other war materiel under horrendous conditions and in the face of concentrated Allied bombing attacks. Moving into the twenty-first century the German factories remain among the best in the world.
Construct a [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_INDUSTRIAL_PARK]Industrial Park[\LINK]
+15 XP for all Armored or Helicopter Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Castle or Mughal Fort..
+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Sea Resources worked by this City. +15 XP for all Naval Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one Sea Resource with Fishing Boats nearby.
+50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Spaceship Parts. +15 XP for all Air Units. Requires 1 [ICON_RES_ALUMINUM] Aluminum.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Factory.

Forms a [ICON_CONNECTED] Trade Route with the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital over water (if they're not already [ICON_CONNECTED] connected by land). +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +10 XP when building Naval Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built on the coast.

[ICON_HAPPINESS_1][COLOR_{1_color}]Built The Great Wall and The Porcelain Tower at the chinese city(s).[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{2_color}]At least one non-combat units arrived in Rome before AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{3_color}]First to enter Medieval Era and first to complete Civil Service.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CAPITAL][COLOR_{4_color}]Recovery of the whole territory by 1368AD.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{1_color}]First to set foot on the New World(North America), and to settle 4 cities by 1620AD and to keep them until 1945AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_STRENGTH][COLOR_{2_color}]First to colonize Australia.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{3_color}]Declare war on India before 1600AD and until 1849 AD; have at least 4 cities in India by then.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CAPITAL][COLOR_{4_color}]No cultural influences from other main civilizations on the homeland.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{1_color}]Control Rome, Greece, France and Belgium by 1870 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{2_color}]Control England, Wales, Scotland and the European part of the Soviet Russia by 1940 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{3_color}]Have at least three times the military power as the most powerful rival by 1940 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_STRENGTH][COLOR_{4_color}]Be the first to complete the future tech.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_RESEARCH][COLOR_{1_color}]Be 1st in score in 1500 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CAPITAL][COLOR_{2_color}]No foreign culture in any plot of Japanese.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{3_color}]Never lose a city before 1850 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{4_color}]Control Corea, Manchuria, the north region of China, Southeast Asia and Indonesia in 1940 AD.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{1_color}]Initiate the battle of Yamen and destroy the Chinese civilization before AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{2_color}]Raze at least 7 cities.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{3_color}]Control 12% of world territory by 1260 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_STRENGTH][COLOR_{4_color}]Destroy at least 6 civilizations and 3 city states.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{1_color}]Control Siberia by 1700 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CITIZEN][COLOR_{2_color}]Never lose a city until 1950 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{3_color}]Be the first to discover Horseback Riding, Chivalry, Metallurgy and Military Science.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION][COLOR_{4_color}]Build the Apollo Program by 1950 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{5_color}]Make contact with the US before 1783 AD. All stats must remain higher than those of the US from 1783.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{1_color}]Allow no European colonies in the North and Central America and in the Caribbean in 1900 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{2_color}]Build the UN, the Statue of Liberty and the Pentagon by 1945 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_STRENGTH][COLOR_{3_color}]Capture Iraq by 2000 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{4_color}]Build and launch the first two nuclear weapons.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_STRENGTH][COLOR_{5_color}]Establish 3 naval bases in Asia before 1945.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{1_color}]Have more than 500 Culture in 850 BC.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{2_color}]Build the Pyramids, the Great Library, and the Great Lighthouse by 100 BC.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CAPITAL][COLOR_{3_color}]Have more than 5000 Culture in 800 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{4_color}]Always control the Suez after 1000 BC.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{1_color}]Control 8% of world territory in 600 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{2_color}]Control 9 world wonders in 350 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_HAPPINESS_1][COLOR_{3_color}]Secure through trade or take control of 5 Dye resources by 350 AD.[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_{4_color}][ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{1_color}]Build 5 Barracks, 5 Coliseum, 5 Monument and 5 Granary by 200 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{2_color}]Control in 470 AD all the area historically known as the Western Roman Empire.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{3_color}]Build Sistine Chapel.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{4_color}]Have an average city population of 5 or more in 1 AD.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_RESEARCH][COLOR_{1_color}]Be the first to discover Construction, Printing Press and Philosophy.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{2_color}]Build the Oracle and the Colossus by 500 BC.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION][COLOR_{3_color}]Control 7 coastal cities in the Mediterranean in 350 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{4_color}]Build 6 world wonders at Athens.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{1_color}]Have 5000 gold in 1000 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{2_color}]Control Egypt, Iberia and Carthage by 1300 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{3_color}]Be the first to discover Biology and quickly secure 70 Oil resources.[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_{4_color}][ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_STRENGTH][COLOR_{1_color}]Be the first to have 9 Destroyer.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH][COLOR_{2_color}]Control the Balkans, the Black Sea and Mesopotamia in 1450 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{3_color}]Secure or get by trade 7 Spices resources by 1200 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{4_color}]Sink 45 ships.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_CITIZEN][COLOR_{1_color}]Destroy the England civilization before 1600.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{2_color}]To keep peace with African civilizations until secure 7 Ivory resources.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{3_color}]Have the world's highest population in 1200 AD.[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_{4_color}][ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{1_color}]Make Paris the city with the highest culture in the world in 1700 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_STRENGTH][COLOR_{2_color}]Colonize Louisiana by 1600 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH][COLOR_{3_color}]Control Quebec and Hudson Bay by 1600 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{4_color}]Build Notre Dame, the Statue of Liberty and the Eiffel Tower by 1889 AD.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{1_color}]Destroy 45 European military land units.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH][COLOR_{2_color}]Allow no European colonies in Central America, Southern USA and the Caribbean in 1700 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{3_color}]Enter the Modern era by 1820 AD.[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_{4_color}][ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{1_color}]Have more than 12000 Culture in 1450 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{2_color}]Have an average city size of 10 or more in 1450 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{3_color}]8 city-state Allies.[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_{4_color}][ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{1_color}]Ensure there are no European colonies at South of the Mediterranean in 1500 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{2_color}]Have 4000 gold in 1500 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{3_color}]Secure or get by trade 7 Gold resources by 1200 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{4_color}]Have 16000 gold in 1700 AD.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLD][COLOR_{1_color}]Be the first to found a city in America.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{2_color}]Be the FirstFinder of a Natural Wonder thrice.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{3_color}]Be the first to find all Natural Wonder.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CAPITAL][COLOR_{4_color}]Control all Aztec and Incan territory in 1760 AD.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{1_color}]Have 10000 gold in 1700 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{2_color}]Build 50 Improvement.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION][COLOR_{3_color}]Be the first to discover Penicillin.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CAPITAL][COLOR_{4_color}]Ensure there are no European settlements in South America.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_RESEARCH][COLOR_{1_color}]Be the first to discover Writing and Mathematics.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH][COLOR_{2_color}]Have 7 Archery Units by 700 BC.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CITIZEN][COLOR_{3_color}]Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 500 BC.[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_{4_color}][ENDCOLOR]
Please contact the author if you know some memorable moments of this nation.
Please contact the author if you know some memorable moments of this nation.

[ICON_RESEARCH][COLOR_{1_color}]Have 5000 gold in 1500 AD.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_HAPPINESS_1][COLOR_{2_color}]First to found city on the New World(North America)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE][COLOR_{3_color}]Always control the Scotland after 1000 BC.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_CAPITAL][COLOR_{4_color}]Always control the Jylland after AD.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_GOLDEN_AGE][COLOR_{1_color}]Built 1 Landmark, 1 Academy, 1 Customs House, 1 Manufacture, 1 Citadel before get 5th city.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_HAPPINESS_4][COLOR_{2_color}]Never allow troops from Sino, Mongolia and Japan into Korean Peninsula[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE][COLOR_{3_color}]Control 6 city which found by Sino, Mongolia or Japan.[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_{4_color}][ENDCOLOR]

National Pride
One of the Historical Mission is successfully completed. People feel happy and proud.
Dissent
One of the Historical Mission has failed. People dissatisfied with the government.
Desert Fox
Rommel
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel (15 November 1891 – 14 October 1944), popularly known as the Desert Fox, was a famous German Field Marshal of World War II.
The Rommel is the German unique unit. He is very stronger and faster. And he also is a great battlefield commander.

Fast and powerful Commander Unit. Receives a penalty when attacking Cities and on defense, but is incredibly effective in open ground.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Only the Germans may get it by mission. This Unit has 6 movement, all others in adjacent tiles [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Heal 2 Additional HP[ENDCOLOR] per turn.
